scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run flow-copy
scripts.flow-copy:cjs: flow-copy-source -i=__test__**/* src lib && cp -rf src/**/*flow lib/**/*flow
scripts.flow-copy:es: flow-copy-source -i=__test__**/* src es && cp src/*flow es
scripts.flow-copy: npm run flow-copy:cjs && npm run flow-copy:es
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src/ --ignore src/__test__ -d lib -s --delete-dir-on-start
scripts.build:es: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src/ --ignore src/__test__ -d es -s --delete-dir-on-start
